Posts.Content: I am a little paranoid,I am afraid to do any exercises without thinking I am going to break a bone,scared of turning from side to side when in bed.I have major spine surgery from C6 toT3 a year ago, 4 months after I had another fracture( T5) but this time it was same day surgery  using some kind of cement (plasty) by going through a small incision in the back..I am getting treated with Aredia to strenght the bones once/month via IV for the past 12 months. Im going to contact the website you are suggesting...Thank you so much for replying!
Posts.Title: Multiple myeloma...
